tat atas siddham abhāva pramāṇa abhimatasya aprāmāṇyam iti
nibandh
athavā abhāva pramāṇa svarūpam eva nirūpyatām
kaḥ punar pramāṇa abhāva ātmā abhimataḥ bhavatām
kim prasajya vṛttyā pramāṇa anutpatti mātram
atha vā paryudāsa vṛttyā bhāva antaram
vastu antaram api jaḍa rūpam jñāna rūpam vā
jñāna rūpam api jñāna mātrakam eka jñāna saṃsargi vastu jñānam vā iti ṣaṭ vikalpāḥ
tatra na tāvat nivṛtti rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ yujyate
sa khalu nikhila śakti vikala tayā na kiñcid
yat ca na kiñcid tat katham abhāvam paricchindyāt
tad viṣayam vā jñānam janayet
pratītam vā tat katham iti sarvam andhakāra nartanam
yat āhuḥ

original: na hyabhāvaḥ kasyacit pratipattiḥ pratipattiheturvā tasyāpi kathaṃ pratipattiriti /
analyzed: na hi abhāvaḥ kasyacid pratipattiḥ pratipatti hetuḥ vā tasya api katham pratipattiḥ iti
nā api vastu antara tā pakṣe jaḍa rūpaḥ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchate
tasya abhāva lakṣaṇa prameya pariccheda abhāvāt
paricchedasya jñāna dharma tvāt
nā api jñāna mātra svabhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
deśa kāla svabhāva viprakṛṣṭasya api tatas bhāva prasaṅgāt
tad apekṣayā api jñāna mātra tvāt tasya
atha eka jñāna saṃsargi vastu jñāna svabhāvaḥ tad āstam abhāva pramāṇa pratyāśayā
pratyakṣa viśeṣasya eva abhāva nāma karaṇāt
tasya ca asmābhiḥ dṛśya anupalambha ākhya sādhana tvena svīkṛta tvāt
atas na kācid vipratipattiḥ nāma
tasmāt abhāva pramāṇa svarūpam arpi nirūpyamāṇam viśīryate eva
yat api asya lakṣaṇam uktam
pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate
ityādi tat api yācitaka maṇḍanam
tasmāt sthitam etat
pramāṇasya sataḥ tra eva antarbhāvāt pramāṇe eva
pramāṇa antarbhāva prakaraṇam samāptam
iha dahana ādinā dhūma ādeḥ artha antarasya vyāptiḥ tad utpatti lakṣaṇā
sā ca viśiṣṭa anvaya vyatireka grahaṇa pravaṇa viśiṣṭa pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanā iti nyāyaḥ
atra ca bhaṭṭa prabhṛtayaḥ vipratipadyante

original: tathā hi te 'gnimati pradeśe dhūmasya bhūyodarśanaṃ tadviyukte ca tathaivādarśanamityanvayavyatirekitvaṃ kalpayāmbabhūvuḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi te gnimati pradeśe dhūmasya bhūyaḥ darśanam tad viyukte ca tathā eva adarśanam iti anvaya vyatireki tvam kalpayāmbabhūvuḥ

original: nanu bhūyasāpi pravṛtte darśanādarśane ghaṭakulaṭādāvupalabdho vyabhicāra iti cet /
analyzed: nanu bhūyasā api pravṛtte darśana adarśane ghaṭa kulaṭā ādau upalabdhaḥ vyabhicāraḥ iti ced
kim etāvatā tatra api anumānam astu
tadvat vā dhūma ādau api bhās bhūt
prathama pakṣaḥ tāvat vyabhicārāt eva nirastaḥ
dvitīyaḥ upi vyabhicārāt eva
na hi anyasya vyabhicāre dhūmasya kiñcid

original: tasmādagnidhūmayoravyabhicārasyāsaṃbhave śatamapi tadupapattayaḥ tatprasādhakaviśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhā vā nānumānopayoginaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt agni dhūmayoḥ avyabhicārasya asaṃbhave śatam api tad upapattayaḥ tad prasādhaka viśiṣṭa pratyakṣa anupalambhāḥ vā na anumāna upayoginaḥ

original: saṃbhave vā kiṃ tadutpattyā tadupayoginā viśiṣṭapratyakṣānupalambhena,
analyzed: saṃbhave vā kim tad utpattyā tad upayoginā viśiṣṭa pratyakṣa anupalambhena
darśana adarśanābhyām eva avyabhicāra siddheḥ

original: tathā ca kāśikākāraḥ prācīnānekadarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyenacarameṇa cetasā dhūmasyāgniniyatatvaṃ gṛhyata iti //
analyzed: tathā ca kāśikā ākāraḥ prācīna aneka darśana janita saṃskāra sahāyena carameṇa cetasā dhūmasya agni niyata tvam gṛhyate iti

original: trilocanastvāha - pratyakṣānupalambhayorviśeṣaviṣayatvāt kathaṃ tābhyāṃ sāmānyayoḥ saṃbandhapratipattiḥ /
analyzed: trilocanaḥ tu āha pratyakṣa anupalambhayoḥ viśeṣa viṣaya tvāt katham tābhyām sāmānyayoḥ saṃbandha pratipattiḥ
atha anagni vyāvṛttena a dhūma vyāvṛttasya saṃbandhaḥ pratīyate eva iti
nanu saḥ pi kasya pramāṇasya viṣayaḥ
na tāvat pratyakṣasya
sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tvāt tasya
na api anumānasya
tasya api tad pūrvaka tvāt
na ca vyāvṛtyoḥ kaścid saṃbandhaḥ
atha pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvī vikalpaḥ dṛṣṭe bhede bhedam adhyavasyati
tat eva sāmānyam
evam api vikalpānām na vastvena viṣayaḥ
api tu grāhya ākāraḥ
sa ca na vastu
vastu tu teṣām parokṣam eva iti
katham tena api sambandha grahaḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu bhūyodarśanasahāyena manasā tajjātīyānāṃ saṃbandho gṛhīto bhavati /
analyzed: asmākam tu bhūyas darśana sahāyena manasā tad jātīyānām saṃbandhaḥ gṛhītaḥ bhavati
atas dhūmaḥ na agnim vyabhicarati
tad vyabhicāre dhūmaḥ upādhi rahitam saṃbandham atikrāmet iti hetu vipakṣa śaṅkā nivartakam pramāṇam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta upādhi viraha hetuḥ anupalambha ākhyam
pratyakṣam eva
tatas siddhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ sambandhaḥ
vācaspateḥ tu prapañcaḥ

original: tathā hi dhumādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi dhuma ādīnām vahni ādibhiḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
na tu vahni ādīnām dhūma ādibhiḥ
te hi vinā api dhūma ādibhiḥ upalabhyante
vahni ādayaḥ tu yadā ārdra indhana saṃbandham anubhavanti tadā dhūma ādibhiḥ saṃbadhyante
vahni ādīnām

original: Nibandh 107) tu sphuṭamārdrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandho na tu svābhāvikaḥ /
analyzed: tu sphuṭam ārdra indhana ādi upādhi kṛtaḥ saṃbandhaḥ na tu svābhāvikaḥ
tatas niyataḥ
svābhāvikaḥ tu dhūma ādīnām vahnayā ādibhiḥ saṃbandhaḥ
tad upādheḥ anupalabhyamāna tvāt
kvacid vyabhicārasya adarśanāt anupalabhyamānasya api kalpanā anupapatteḥ

original: na cādṛśyamāno 'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena sagdihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca adṛśyamānaḥ api darśana anarha tayā sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvena upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvika tvam pratibadhnāti iti yuktam
avaśyam śaṅkayā bhāvyam niyāmakam apaśyatām

original: iti tu dattāvakāśā laukikamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
analyzed: iti tu datta avakāśā laukika maryādā atikrameṇa śaṅkā piśācī labdha prasarā na kvacid nā asti iti na ayam kvacid pravarteta
sarvatra eva kasyacid anarthasya kathañcid śaṅkā āspada tvāt
anartha śaṅkāyāḥ ca prekṣāvatām nivṛtti aṅga tvāt
antatas snigdha anna pāna upayoge maraṇa darśanāt
tasmāt prāmāṇika lokayātrām anupālayatā yathādarśanam eva śaṅkanīyam
na tu a dṛṣṭa pūrvam api
viśeṣa smṛti apekṣaḥ eva hi saṃśayaḥ na asmṛteḥ bhavati
na ca smṛtiḥ ananubhūta care bhavitum arhati
tat uktam mīmāṃsā vārtika kṛtā
na āśaṅkā niḥpramāṇikā iti

original: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt upādhim prayatnena anviṣyantaḥ na asti iti avagamya svābhāvika tvam saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ

original: syādetat / anyasyānyena sahākāraṇena cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet,
analyzed: syāt etat anyasya anyena saha a kāraṇena ced svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ bhavet
sarvam sarveṇa svabhāvataḥ saṃbadhyeta

original: athānyasya cedanyat kāryaṃ kasmāt sarvaṃ sarvasmānna bhavati,
analyzed: atha anyasya ced anyat kāryam kasmāt sarvam sarvasmāt na bhavati

original: tasmādanyatvāviśeṣe 'pi kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca kiñciditi /
analyzed: tasmāt anya tva aviśeṣe kiñcid eva kāraṇam kāryam ca kiñcid iti

original: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva /

original: kena punaḥ pramāṇenaiṣa svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate /

original: tathā hi abhijāatamaṇibhedatattvavad bhūyodarśanajanitasaṃskārasahāyamindriyameva dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādibhiḥ svābhāvikāsaṃbandhagrāhīti yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi abhijā atamaṇi bheda tattva vat bhūyas darśana janita saṃskāra sahāyam indriyam eva dhūma ādīnām vahni ādibhiḥ svābhāvika asaṃbandha grāhi iti yuktam utpaśyāmaḥ

original: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandheṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇānyunnetavyāni /
analyzed: evam māna antara vidita saṃbandheṣu māna antarāṇi eva yathāsvam bhūyas darśana sahāyāni svābhāvika saṃbandha grahaṇe pramāṇāni unnetavyāni

original: svabhāvādeva pracyaveranniti tarkasahāyā nirastasādhyavyatirekavṛttisandehā yatra dṛṣṭāstatra svasādhyamupasthāpayantyeveti //
analyzed: svabhāvāt eva pracyaveran iti tarka sahāyāḥ nirasta sādhya vyatireka vṛtti sandehāḥ yatra dṛṣṭāḥ tatra sva sādhyam upasthāpayanti eva iti

original: atrocyate / iha khalu bhede tadutpattireva vyāptiḥ /

yatra vā niyata tvam asti tatra eva bhūyas darśana pravṛttiḥ
prathama pakṣe ghaṭāt api kulaṭā

original: prathamapakṣe pratipattuḥ kimāyātaṃ yato nānumānamayaṃ kuryāt /

original: śāstrakāraṃ ca pṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭasaṃbandho 'pi dhṛmādagnimanumāsyata ityalaukikam /

original: na hi yatra vyabhicārastatraiva tāvati kāle deśe vāvaśyaṃ pratītimavatarati /

a pratīyamānaḥ ca na asti eva iti na niyamaḥ

ati cira kāla vyavadhāne darśanāt brāhmaṇya ādi vyabhicāra vat
ghaṭa pārthiva ādau pratipattā eva pravṛttaḥ

original: tadaiva krameṇa vā vyabhicāraṃ paśyediti cet /

original: vyaktaṃ tasya tāvat tadapyamānamāpannamiti mahat pāṇḍityam /

original: tato bahulaṃ sahacāramātreṇa na vyabhicārī na vāvyabhicārī niścita iti śaṅkāvakāśaḥ //
analyzed: tatas bahulam sahacāra mātreṇa na vyabhicārī na vā avyabhicārī niścitaḥ iti śaṅkā avakāśaḥ

original: yadyevaṃ dvicandrādau cakṣurādipratyakṣaṃ malinapauruṣamupalabdhamiti ghaṭādikamapi nopasthāpayediti cet / na /
analyzed: yadi evam dvi candra ādau cakṣuḥ ādi pratyakṣam malina pauruṣam upalabdham iti ghaṭa ādikam api na upasthāpayet iti ced na
indriya viṣaya kāryam hi pratyakṣam

original: Nibandh 109) tato bhinnalakṣaṇasya pratyakṣābhāsattve 'pi ghaṭajñānaṃ pratyakṣameva /

original: na caivaṃ dhūmādau pārthivatvādau ca vyāptigrāhakasya bhūyodarśanasya lakṣaṇabhedo yenaikatrāśvāsaḥ syāt //

original: ete evārthakāryatvākāryatve lakṣaṇabheda iti cet / na /

original: na cātra dhūmasyāgnisahacāraḥ sadātano 'yamatha suhṛddvayasyeva sātyayo gṛhīta iti saṃśaye sadātanasahacāraprasādhakapramāṇāntarasaṅgatirasti,
analyzed: na ca atra dhūmasya agni sahacāraḥ sadātanaḥ yam atha suhṛd dvayasya iva sa atyayaḥ gṛhītaḥ iti saṃśaye sadātana sahacāra prasādhaka pramāṇa antara saṅgatiḥ asti
tad kāryam vā kiñcid upalabhyate

original: tarhi bādhyamānatvābādhyamānatvalakṣaṇo lakṣaṇabhedo bhaviṣyatītyapi na vaktavyam,
analyzed: tarhi bādhyamāna tva abādhyamāna tva lakṣaṇaḥ lakṣaṇa bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti api na vaktavyam

analyzed: pramāṇa antara saṅgatiḥ artha kriyā lābhaḥ vā paryudāsaḥ ca asiddhaḥ iti na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: niyatatvābhāve 'pi pārthivatvādau bhūyodarśanasaṃbhavāditi na bhūyodarśanagamyā vyāptiḥ //

original: yadvi yatra jñāne pratibhāsate tad grāhyam /

original: na hi parasantānāpekṣayā kaścid viśeṣaleśaḥ svasantānasya parisphurati yo nāsti śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā /
analyzed: na hi para santāna apekṣayā kaścid viśeṣa leśaḥ sva santānasya parisphurati yaḥ nā asti śaśa viṣāṇa apekṣayā

original: na ca śaśaviṣāṇaparasantānāvapekṣya samāne svasantānapratibhāse śaśaviṣāṇāpekṣayā na bhedo nāpyabhedaḥ pratibhāti /
analyzed: na ca śaśa viṣāṇa para santānau apekṣya samāne sva santāna pratibhāse śaśa viṣāṇa apekṣayā na bhedaḥ na api abhedaḥ pratibhāti

original: parasantānāpekṣayā tu bheda eva bhātītyevamavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
analyzed: para santāna apekṣayā tu bhedaḥ eva bhāti iti evam avasthāpayitum śakyam

original: bhedābhedayorabhāvaparihāreṇa hi yathā bhedo vyavasthitaḥ tadvad bhedapratibhāso 'pi bhedābhedābhāvapratibhāsavilakṣaṇa evocito bhavitum,
analyzed: bheda abhedayoḥ abhāva parihāreṇa hi yathā bhedaḥ vyavasthitaḥ tadvat bheda pratibhāsaḥ api bheda abheda abhāva pratibhāsa vilakṣaṇaḥ eva ucitaḥ bhavitum
na ca tathā anubhūyate
tathā api bhedaḥ pratibhāti iti vacana racanam etat
bhāṣyakāra nyāyaḥ u pi atra bheda pratibhāsa dūṣaṇe vistarataḥ vagantavyaḥ
nibandh
yadi ca avadhi pratibhāsa virahe bheda pratibhānam idam para citta anukampayā
kṣamitavyam tarhi
bahis arthasya api katham abhāvaḥ sidhyati
śakyam hi tatra api sandeham avatārayitum
na bahis arthaḥ kasyacid ābhāsate
para santānaḥ tu parasya pratibhāsate eva

original: tataścātraiva sandeho na bahirartha iti cet /
analyzed: tatas ca atra eva sandehaḥ na bahis arthaḥ iti ced
etat api sakalam sandigdham eva
na hi avaśyam para santānaḥ parasya ābhāsate

original: kadācidasau nāstyeva na cāsāvavabhāsata ityapi vaktuṃ śakteḥ /
analyzed: kadācid asau nā asti eva na ca asau avabhāsate iti api vaktum śakteḥ

original: kiṃ ca mā nāma bhāsīṣṭa bahirarthaḥ kasyacidapi tathāpi kathaṃ tadabhāvasiddhirbhedapratibhāsābhyupagamavādina itīyanmātramiha vivakṣitam /
analyzed: kim ca mā nāma bhāsīṣṭa bahis arthaḥ kasyacid api tathā api katham tad abhāva siddhiḥ bheda pratibhāsa abhyupagama vādinaḥ iti iyat mātram iha vivakṣitam
na ca atra kaścid doṣaḥ

original: tasmād bahirarthena sādhāraṇaṃ santānāntaramiti kathaṃ vijñaptivādināmapi saṃmataṃ bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tasmāt bahis arthena sādhāraṇam santāna antaram iti katham vijñapti vādinām api saṃmatam bhaviṣyati

original: kiṃ ca kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi vijñānadvayasya bhedapratibhāsavādinā bādhitumaśakyaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ vijñāna dvayasya bheda pratibhāsa vādinā bādhitum aśakyaḥ

original: pūrvabhāvinī hi saṃvittiḥ parasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ pūrvatvaṃ cātmano gṛhṇātyevāvadhipratibhāsavigame 'pi //
analyzed: pūrva bhāvinī hi saṃvittiḥ para saṃvitti apekṣayā bhedam pūrva tvam ca ātmanaḥ gṛhṇāti eva avadhi pratibhāsa vigame pi

original: parabhāvinyapi saṃvittiḥ pūrvasaṃvittyapekṣayā bhedaṃ paratvaṃ cātmano 'dhigacchatyeva
analyzed: para bhāvinī api saṃvittiḥ pūrva saṃvitti apekṣayā bhedam paratvam ca ātmanaḥ dhigacchati eva
santāna antara vat iti niyata pūrva apara bhāva lakṣaṇe kārya kāraṇa bhāve vabhāsamāne vasīyamāne
ca nīla ādi citra ākāra vat katham
saṃvṛttyāḥ tu yathā tathā

original: iti bhagavato vārtikakārasya vacanena phalitamatra mate /

api ca citra ākāra cakre dharmiṇi advaita sādhana artham upanyastasya prakāśamāna tva ādi hetoḥ bheda grāhaka pratyakṣa apahṛta viṣaya tvam udbhāvayataḥ

original: prativādino bhedagrahaṇamanumanyamānena santānāntarasandehaṃ ca vinā kathamuttaritavyaṃ bhavatā //
analyzed: prativādinaḥ bheda grahaṇam anumanyamānena santāna antara sandeham ca vinā katham uttaritavyam bhavatā
nanu evam api santāna antara abhāvaḥ kena pramāṇena siddhaḥ

na api anumānena

atra brūmaḥ

abhede sva santānāt para santānaḥ eva syāt

original: yathā ca yadupalabhyamānaṃ yenaṃ rūpeṇa na bhāsate na tat tena rūpeṇa sadvyavahārayogyaṃ yathā nīlaṃ pītarūpeṇa /
analyzed: yathā ca yat upalabhyamānam yena idam rūpeṇa na bhāsate na tat tena rūpeṇa sat vyavahāra yogyam yathā nīlam pīta rūpeṇa
na upalabhyate ca sva cittam upalabhyamānam para santānāt bhinnena
rūpeṇa iti bhedasya sva citta tādātmya niṣedhe dṛśya viśeṣaṇa prayoga anapekṣā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ iyam
na api asiddhiḥ
bheda pratibhāse tad avadheḥ api pratibhāsa prāpteḥ

original: avadhyapratibhāse tu bhedapratibhāsābhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇabhedapratibhāsābhāvavat siddha eva /
analyzed: avadhya pratibhāse tu bheda pratibhāsa abhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇa bheda pratibhāsa abhāva vat siddhaḥ eva

original: evamanena pramāṇena santānāntarasya svacittāpekṣayā bhede pratikṣipte abhede ca svayamevāsaṃbhavini bhedābhedābhyāmavācyatvaṃ siddham /
analyzed: evam anena pramāṇena santāna antarasya sva citta apekṣayā bhede pratikṣipte abhede ca svayam eva asaṃbhavini bheda abhedābhyām avācya tvam siddham

etat ca śāstrīya prameya smāraṇa mātra phalam kiñcid likhitam iti
param iha svayam anusandheyam

original: api ca santānāntare tāvadarvāgdṛśāṃ sandeho bhavadbhiranumanyate /
analyzed: api ca santāna antare tāvat arvāk dṛśām sandehaḥ bhavadbhiḥ anumanyate

original: vidyamānameva kadācit santānāntaraṃ bhagavatā nāvadhāryate tathāpyasau sarvajña iti kathametat /

original: pratyakṣeṇa paracittapratītau grāhyagrāhakabhāvo 'pi paracittasya bhagavaccittena sahāyāta iti bahirarthavāda eva mukhāntareṇopagataḥ syāt,

original: yāvacca bhedagrahaṇābhimānarūpā saṃvṛsttitāvat santānāntare sandehāttadavabodhanārthaṃ vacanādirapi pravartata iti svavacanavirodho 'pi na
